Reference version 0.99.0

All functions

add_eqv_aes

Add equivalent Americanized and base equivalent names to ggplot aesthetic list

addGrid

Add a Grid to an Existing Plot.

addTableToMargin

Create Tabular Environment from Matrix and Add it to Margin.

addXlabTable

Create Tabular Environment from Matrix and Add it to Bottom Margin.

aes_arg_is_uneval

Determine if an argument is an unevaluated expression

allowed_aesthetics

Get list of allowed aesthetics for a given geometry class

append_split_terms

Wrap a formula in a helper list splitting response and predictor terms

append_weights

Append argument list with calculated weights as frequency

as.rgb

Convert color-names or RGB-code to possibly semi-transparent RGB-code.

augment_predict

Adds prediction outputs to data based on model and formula

AvailableDocs

Show available documents

BoxPlot

Box/Box-Percentile Plot with additional vertical stripchart, mean(s), and trend-lines.

BPplot

Enhanced Box-Percentile Plots.

clean_emmeans_specs

Helper function to clean one-sided formulas for emmeans

coerce_from_factor

Coerce dataframe variables to new type

CompareKM

Compare KM curve of full population vs. BEP

copy_variable_attributes

Copy attributes of dataframe variables from a source dataframe

CoxTab

Summary outputs from cox proportional model

filter_aesthetics

Helper function to filter aesthetic mappings based on geometry

filter_args

Helper function for ggpack to filter arguments based on a prefix

flatten_aesthetics_to_group

Helper function to flatten specific aesthetics to group

geom_text_table

Geom to display text as a table overlayed upon the plot

GeomTextTable

A ggplot2 Geom object to add a table of text values to a plot

get_emmeans_specs_predictors

Return predictors from specs input

get_model_formula

Get model formula from a model object

get.colors

Choose an R standard color or get the RGB-code of an arbitrary color.

getMatrix

Construct Matrix from Formula and Names.

ggpack

Handling of argument passing to ggplots

ggpacket-class

A class for wrapping ggplot layers.

ggpk_decorators

Wrapper for common decorators to package

ggpk_line_errorbar

ggplot wrapper for plotting ribbon, taking a stats string or function set as an argument

ggpk_ribbons

ggplot wrapper for plotting ribbon, taking a stats string or function set as an argument

initialize

Initialize empty ggpacket

data input

Data example

data input.specs

Data specs example

LogRankTab

Log rank test p value and other summary statistics for subgroup analysis

names

Overload names method to print ggpacket ggcall list names

numeric_means

List means over numeric variables

OpenDoc

Access package documents

PlotDens

Plot Density

PlotKM

Generate KM curve(s) for full population or subgroups defined by single factor or multiple factors

PlotLong

Wrapper for fitting model and adjusting to predicted values and passing newly fitted model to ggplot geom_stat_ribbon

PlotParam

Set graphical parameters

PlotProperty

Plot Distribution

PlotRspBar

Generate bar plot to summarize response outcome by subgroups

PlotSTEPP

Create a STEPP (Subpopulation Treatment Effect Pattern Plot)

PlotTabForestBiomarker

Generate forest plot and summarization table for 2-arm or within-arm comparison

PlotTabForestMulti

Generate forest plot and summarization table for 2-arm or within-arm comparison for multiple variables

+,gg,ggpacket-method

Combine ggpacket contents with gg call to incorporate seamlessly with ggplot calls

+,ggpacket,ANY-method

Primitive methods for adding ggpackets to various ggplot objects

+,NULL,ggpacket-method

Add NULL to a ggpacket to return the ggpacket

print_to_string

Capture output and return as string

ReadData

Read data

ReadVAD

Read a VAD

remove_aesthetics

Helper function to filter out aesthetics from mappings

sas.emmeans

Compute emmeans to mirror SAS emmeans functionality

show

Overload show method to print ggpacket

sink_to_temp

Helper function to hide side effect output to console

split_aes_from_dots

Helper function to cull aesthetic mapping from parameter inputs in ellipses

split_on_name

Helper function to split a list on a named args

stat_summary_funs

helper function to interpret strings and functions passed to geom_stat_ribbons

[,ggpacket,ANY,ANY,ANY-method

Overload [ generic to index into ggcalls list

[[,ggpacket-method

Overload [ generic to index into ggcalls list

summarize_unary_vars

Produce summary table of unary value of specified levels

SummarySingle

Summary a single covariate, test across treatment and/or population

SummaryTwoGroups

Summary statistics of two-group comparison

SummaryVars

Summary multiple covariates, test across treatment and/or population
